Examples
========

Best way to get hands on with pyphoon is have a look at some code examples.
In this section we present what we believe are the most important tools and
features from the library. Make sure to read the `data <data.html>`_ section
before.

In addition, we released some notebooks that you may access `here`_.

.. _here:
    https://github.com/lucasrodes/pyphoon/tree/master/notebooks


..  toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2

    Best Track EDA <examples/best_eda>
    Working with a typhoon sequence <examples/typhoon_sequence>
    Correcting image data <examples/correct_image>
    Create database <examples/create_db>
